    public interface MedlineReader
    Interface for reading Medline citations Created: Mon Dec 10 10:11:35 2012
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Willie Rogers

    • Method Detail

      • readCitations

        void readCitations(String inputFilename,
                   Map<String,Citation> citationMap,
                   Set<String> emptyCitationSet)
        Extract content of individual citations to map of citations by pmid.
        Parameters:
        inputFilename - filename referencing XML PUBMED citations file.
        citationMap - map of citations keyed by pmid.
        emptyCitationSet - set of pmids of empty citations.

      • readCitations

        Map<String,Citation> readCitations(String inputFilename)
        Extract content of individual citations to map of citations by pmid.
        Parameters:
        inputFilename - filename referencing XML PUBMED citations file.
        Returns:
        map of citations keyed by pmid.

      • makeCitationMap

        Extract content of individual citations to map of citations by pmid.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        map of citations keyed by pmid.

      • makeCitationList

        List<Citation> makeCitationList(String inputFilename)
        Extract content of individual citations to map of citations by pmid.
        Parameters:
        inputFilename - filename referencing XML PUBMED citations file.
        Returns:
        list of citations
